response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to me. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled benefits and experiences. Considering its quality and the value it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. I believe this represents an excellent investment for you, and I look forward to the chance to discuss how this product could enhance your life or business. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
